page.title: 09FARMING ON CARNEVAS FARM 2
page.content: {ANIMALS -------- Peter has 33{<FRIESIAN/HEREFORD>}and {CHAROLAIS}calves,80 {<FRIESIAN/HEREFORD>}and{CHAROLAIS} bullocks,200 ewes and 350 ewe lamb including ram lambs,4{SUFFOLK}rams, 1 thin{DORSET}horn ram, and 1 polled {DORSET}ram,The breeds of sheep are{ {POLLED DORSET,DEVON}and{CORNWALL {LONGWOOL,BORDER LEICSTER,}and{SCOTCH {HALF BREDS.}There is one old pony. { {CONCERNS AND FUTURE PLANS -------------------------- Peters concerns are the income tax man. Future plans are to expand the farm by growing more wheat and barley, and by having more calves and bullocks.
